description: Detects the import of a alternate datastream to the registry with regedit.exe. Author: Oddvar Moe, Sander Wiebing, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Imports Registry Key From an ADS
query: ((process.executable:*\\regedit.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/i\ * OR *.reg*) AND process.command_line:/:[^ \\\\]/) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*\ \/e\ * OR *\ \/a\ * OR *\ \/c\ *))))
